td.p: RECEIVED BY THE CARRIER GOODS SPECIFIED ABOVE IN APPARENT GOOD ORDER AND CONDITION UNLESS OTHERWISE STATED FOR CARRIAGE FROM THE PLACEOR PORT INDICATED ABOVE TO SUCH PORT OR PLACE: AS AGREED, AUTHORIZED, OR PERMITED HEREIN AND SUBJECT TO ALL THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS APPEARING ON THE FRONT AND REVERSE OF THIS BILL OF LANDING TO WHICH THE MERCHANT
